content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy As a current postgraduate student or researcher at the university, we encourage you to follow our relevant SharePoint site. These have been created so you can connect with others in your field and access all the information you need during your journey with us. Join the network and take advantage of the large variety of training, resources and development opportunities that can help you build your research skills and networks and enable you to flourish. Joining this community allows you to access the information you need to assist you in your degree and gives you the chance to connect with other students through various activities and events. Communications and Marketing University Park Campus Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone:+44 (0)115 82 32353 e: studentcommsoffice@nottingham.ac.uk
